pr_title: HBASE-25300 'Unknown table hbase:quota' happens when desc table in sh…

timeline.message: HBASE-25300 'Unknown table hbase:quota' happens when desc table in shell if quota disabled

timeline.bodyText: Shall we print Quota is disabled when quota table don't exist (same way describe_namespace).
timeline.author: pankaj72981
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -44,7 +44,8 @@ def command(table)
           puts
         end
         formatter.footer
-        if table.to_s != 'hbase:meta'
+        if admin.exists?(::HBaseQuotasConstants::QUOTA_TABLE_NAME.to_s) \

replies.bodyText: OK, let me fix it as you said.
replies.author: ddupg
